EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-03-27-Field-East-ESB-Nashville.Marketing Invite 3.EMAIL - Marketing See
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Nashville Predators Private Game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-nashville/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Meet your fellow IT leaders on March 27th at the Bridgestone Arena for an exclusive cocktail hour and presentation by Turbonomic CTO, Oved Lourie. We will then continue our evening in the Turbonomic private suite for an evening of food, drinks and hockey as P.K. Subban and the Nashville Predators take on Eric Staal and the Minnesota Wild. This event will be an opportunity to network with your peers, share challenges, and discuss strategies in managing complex hybrid cloud landscapes. Will we see you there?
Executive Networking Series Nashville Workload Automation for Your Hybrid Cloud Nashville Predators vs Minnesota Wild Tuesday, March 27th | Bridgestone Arena | 5:00 p.m.
<[[http://turbonomic.com/exec-nashville]]>
Limited seats remain, please reserve yours here <[[http://turbonomic.com/exec-nashville]]>!
Your friends at Turbonomic
